events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's case has been categorized under Refund due to their request for money back on an incorrect item.
This case has been assigned to agent Sarah M. for handling the refund process promptly.
Hello, this is Sarah from Customer Support. I understand you received the wrong item and want to arrange a refund.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the received item to help us verify the issue?
My order number is 789456123 and I've attached a photo showing the incorrect product I received instead of what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will process your refund immediately and send you a prepaid label to return the wrong item.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate the easy process for getting my money back.
Your refund has been processed successfully, and a return label email has been sent. Please check your inbox.
Just following up to ensure you received the refund and no further assistance is needed on your case.
We are closing your refund request case now. Thank you for your patience, and have a great day!
